titles.title: Studio Freehold Pool Access Condo for Sale near Kamala Beach, Phuket.

descriptions.description: 1 Bedroom Condo for sale in Kamala, PhuketSpecial discount for units in the rental pool program. Until the end of Oct 2019 selected units are available as low as 4.4 instead of 5.5 MB, furniture included. Full facility condo in a perfect location just 100 meters from Kamala Beach. The condominium has 260 units of Studio, 1 and 2 Bedrooms. There are 4 swimming pools including 1 rooftop pool with amazing sea views. Additional facilities include a gym,jacuzzi, restaurant and a Kid’s Club. The Kid’s Club is modeled on a Pirates of the Caribbean theme, with the restaurant following a similar theme. There is also an underground car park for added security and peace of mind. Kamala Beach attracts a lot of high-end tourists with a wide range of amazing places of recreation such as the well-known Café del Mar and Phuket Fantasea, both of which are located nearby. The condo is also located not far from convenient stores, supermarket, banks and entertainment venues. With well-equipped facilities and its golden location surrounded by hi-end property projects as well as fresh mountain air throughout the year, Kamala Beach is an attractive location for investing in property. The condominium also holds a hotel license making it an attractive proposition for either residence or investment purposes. For the avid investor, there is a 7% guaranteed return for the first 3 years or the option to opt into the rental pool for 5 years. Please contact Thai Residential for details.

titles.title: 1 Bedroom Beachfront Condo for Sale in Kamala,Phuket.

descriptions.description: 1 Bedroom Condo for sale in Kamala, PhuketThis remarkable beachfront condominium is located along a 100 meter stretch of stunning Kamala Beach, and represents the first phase of an innovative, master-planned community alongside some of Phuket’s most prestigious West Coast addresses. The design visionary behind some of Asia’s most refined luxury landmarks was entrusted with developing this luxury resort, which comprises 75 exclusive units spread across 180 acres of prime beachfront to hillside land, including a 200-Rai (79-acre) nature reserve. These unique estates are nestled within a lush natural amphitheater of forest-cloaked hills that slope down to a pristine expanse of beach on the Andaman Sea. Operated by the internationally-acclaimed Twinpalms Management, you can be assured that the quality of your property will be matched only by the quality of the hospitality and estate management company looking after it. The facilities available onsite include a Fitness Centre, Yoga Studio and Spa Pavilions. There are also four Beach Clubs, which are available for both public and private use. This development is scheduled for completion in December 2018, and is available for sale on a leasehold basis. Lakeside is currently in its pre-launch phase, and is being sold off-plan. Lakeside Pre-Launch Incentive is 6% p.a. guaranteed return for 3 years. Additional/Other 1 bedroom and 2 bedroom condo units also available for sale in Kamala Beach, Phuket. Ownership is on a leasehold or freehold basis. PLEASE CONTACT THAI RESIDENTIAL FOR DETAILS.

titles.title: Spectacular | Beachfront Condominium in Phuket | On Sale Now.

descriptions.description: 1 Bedroom Condo for sale in Kamala, PhuketBeachfront CondominiumPRICE REDUCTION This beachfront condominium residence at MontAzure offers buyers a unique, integrated beachfront resort and residential community in Phuket’s last remaining prime west coast location, just steps from 99 meters of pristine sands at Kamala Beach. Conceived by Martin Palleros(Tierra Design), the team behind the island’s most successful contemporary resort – Twin Palms Phuket – the MontAzure development displays all the symmetry of a Mondrian painting with a harmonious blend of contemporary tropical architecture and site-sensitive landscaping. This is Phuket’s new mixed-use mountain to oceanside development, The Condominium Residences will be professionally managed and operated as long-term and short-term holiday accommodation, allowing investors to combine a healthy island lifestyle with healthy returns on their investment.A choice of exclusive leisure activities and relaxation options, combined with new benchmarks in luxury living will create a unique resort residential community at MontAzure. The residences are grouped as a series of low-rise clusters with private elevators to reach each floor. The buildings have been orchestrated around one of two generous communal swimming pools and offer intimate views of the beautifully landscaped gardens and inspiring tropical surroundings managed by TwinPalms. The MontAzure Residences are designed and layered using two principal materials - exposed concrete and timber. These natural textures reflect ease and informality, providing a relaxed resort feel for the entire development. The landscape palette combines dense coastal trees and plantings, interwoven with more intimate tropical gardens. The flora used throughout the development specifically relates to the nearby forest, with mature palms added to the beachside pool area. The Twimpalms is the officially appointed management for the investment properties in the development. They will also provide 24-hour onsite management and their dedicated resort-based team will provide guests with direct reservations, hospitality services, maintenance, security, and more. MontAzure beachfront condominium in Kamala Phuket Thailand, on sale now!

titles.title: Kamala Sea View Luxury Apartment For Sale.

descriptions.description: 2 Bedroom Condo for sale in Kamala, PhuketAndara PhuketThis Kamala sea view apartment is a spacious two bed, three bath layout with an open plan living/dining and kitchen area. Both living and master bedroom areas open out onto the private terrace and pool deck. This Kamala sea view luxury apartment was completed in 2008 and has been well maintained since. Set within an exclusive Andara resort on the infamous Millionaires Mile in Kamala on the west coast of Phuket, the property affords views of the ocean and the mountainous terrain of the Kamala hills. When in residence the owner can enjoy fine dining at home with their very own personal chef or they can dine out at the numerous fine-dining restaurants in the area. Phuket has arguably the best boat grounds in South East Asia and has won a number of awards over the years and stunning east coast boating is just a short 30-minute drive to some of the major marinas. Phuket may be a tropical island, however, international schooling and world-class medical care are available and within easy reach of Kamala. Fitness and well-being are an enormous part of the Phuket lifestyle and numerous high-end wellness centers and spas are dotted along the west coast. This wonderful Andara luxury apartment not only enjoys a private pool but breathtaking sea views. As part of this 5* luxury branded resort the owner has access to all the accompanying facilities, 40m swimming pool, 8 person Jacuzzi, cabanas, cocktail bar, modern-day spa, high tech gym, and personal trainers, fine dining restaurant, and exclusive superyacht charter. This Kamala sea view residence is within easy walking distance to Kamala beach, arguably one of the most scenic beaches in southern Thailand with its mountainous backdrop. The dining area is spacious and large enough to accommodate 6-8 guests comfortably. The main living and relaxation area is set slightly lower than the rest of the residence making the area both functional and easy on the eye. The master bedroom is large and spacious with a walk-through wardrobe area and a luxurious bathroom with a deep tub, perfect for a lazy soak. The interior of the property is very tastefully decorated with Jim Thompson soft silk panels, sumptuous sofas, teakwood furniture, and beautiful artifacts. The European kitchen is a delight to use, well equipped, spacious, and ergonomic. A separate laundry room is next to the kitchen and is fitted with a top brand washing machine.The video is from the developer Andara and not the actual apartment. It covers the Brand and property.

descriptions.description: 1 Bedroom Condo for sale in Kamala, PhuketOceanfront residences nestled on the slopes of Kamala on Millionaire’s Mile Road, offering breath taking views of the Andaman Sea. Arguably Phuket’s most exclusive coast, this area is also home to numerous 5-star resorts and luxurious villas. This dazzling condominium development has taken advantage of its close proximity to the azure Andaman Sea and offers sweeping ocean views from most of its units. In tune with the tropical landscape of Phuket, these Oceanfront Residences benefit from a vantage point overlooking the pristine Kamala Beach. Ever mindful of nature, the development uses the natural hilly landscape to its advantage, offering stunning ocean views and sunsets over the Andaman Sea. With 5-star facilities that include swimming pools overlooking the ocean, 5-star restaurants, a fitness club, a spa and recreational area, a kids’ club, and a breathtaking viewpoint from a hilltop, this oceanfront condominium epitomizes luxury living. This oceanfront studio condo for sale near Kamala Beach in Phuket comes fully furnished and measures 33.96 sqm. Two of these units can be combined into one luxurious 2-bedroom unit. This development is managed by the global hotel group, Wyndham Hotel Group, under their Ramada Plaza brand. A consolidated partnership with this reputable Hotel group allows buyers great returns on their investments, making this oceanfront condo residence one of the most enticing investment opportunities on the island. These luxury residences are available for sale off-plan, and can be purchased on either a freehold or leasehold basis. You may also consider taking advantage of the optional Rental Program, designed for those owners and investors looking to maximise their rental returns while not in residence. Kamala Beach, where there are numerous restaurants and shops is a 10 minute walk or a 2 minute drive. Patong is a 15 minute drive. The golf courses of Kathu is in 20 minutes. Phuket International Airport is a 40 minute drive. Additional studio, 1 bedroom and 2 bedroom units also available for sale. Mobility accessible units also available. Units can be purchased as FOREIGN FREEHOLD. Other studio condo units also available for sale near Kamala Beach, Phuket. Please contact Thai Residential for details.

As a promotional offer this 1 bedroom condo for sale in Kamala, comes fully furnished and is FOREIGN FREEHOLD.
Hidden away in the tropics of this bay and surrounded by lush vegetation and towering palm trees, is a modern, luxurious development nestled in the hills of Kamala. Famous for its vibrant nightlife, abundant shopping malls and boutiques, endless restaurant choices and a wide array of entertainment venues, Patong is Phuket’s quintessential tourist destination. Patong caters to all tastes, and there is something for everyone in this beachside town.
A free shuttle service is offered from the condo to Patong so that guests can experience the “bright lights, big city” of Phuket.

titles.title: 1 Bedroom Foreign Freehold Condo for Sale in Kamala, Phuket.

descriptions.description: 1 Bedroom Condo for sale in Kamala, PhuketRESALE. A spacious, foreign freehold, fully furnished and recently renovated 1 bedroom condo for sale, within a resort residence located on the west coast of Phuket. It is set on a lush tropical hillside, surrounded by a stunning natural forest under a canopy of trees, less than 5 minutes drive to Kamala Beach. All units offer views of the mountains, forest or in some cases distant sea views. Each of the condo units has been designed to take full advantage of the surrounding nature and environment. This 1 bedroom condo is 80sqm with a full walk-around balcony running from the living area to the master bedroom. The master bedroom features full sliding doors to take advantage of the view and refreshing breezes. The owner has fully renovated this 1 bedroom condo to an extremely high standard. This is now very likely the best conditioned and most modern unit in the entire development. The flooring has been replaced, lighting system changed to LED, even the air-conditioning has been replaced. The bathroom has been completely re-fitted with new non-slip floors, white marble counter, quartz mosaics wall, new shower, new toilet and all new cupboards. The walls have been completely tiled (instead of painted). All fittings are from Hafele. The kitchen is brand new and professionally fully fitted by a leading designer. Appliances include a new 4 ring induction cooker, steam/traditional oven, fridge freezer, hoods, Indian black granite counter tops and ample storage space. All crockery and cutlery are new and complete. The living room furniture, bed and all fitted storage space and wardrobe are all new. The Italian sofa bed is a useful option for any children or guests staying. Everything in this unit is new as it was stripped back to a shell and completely re-built. Facilities and features include 24-Hour Security, Children’s Pool, Communal Garden, Communal Pool, Estate Management, Gym, Parking, Reception, Restaurant, Shuttle Bus and a Tennis Court. Kamala Beach is 2.5KM away or less than 5 minutes drive. Patong, with it’s vibrant nightlife and Jungceylon Shopping Centre, is only 20 minutes away. Laguna, Asia’s first integrated resort complex, is also only 20 minutes away. Phuket International Airport is in 45 minutes. Additional condo units of studio, 1 bedroom, 2 bedroom and 3 bedroom also available for sale. Please contact Thai Residential for details.

descriptions.description: 1 Bedroom Condo for sale in Kathu, PhuketRESALE. Close to 3 major world class golf courses, this uniquely designed condo is a perfect oasis in a peaceful lakeside environment wrapped in nature. You are surrounded by a lush green forest, mountains and a lake; only a short drive from the hectic and busy life of Phuket. You may relax at the pool with a refreshing cocktail, enjoy the well-kept gardens, play a round of golf at the nearby world class golf courses, cycle or explore the island. Here you will find everything that you are looking for and a lot more. The condo is in a quiet peaceful spot away from the touristic hustle and bustle. If you wish, however, all the action is within a short distance and can easily be reached by car or motorbike. Close by is a waterski park, Tiger Kingdom and Go Cart, Shopping Centers and the Phuket Night Market. Everything is just within a few minutes drive for your perfect residence or holiday home. Located in Kathu district in the heart of Phuket Island. Patong, the beach, nightlife, restaurants and shopping is just 15 minutes drive away. The British International School as well as Phuket International Hospital are also both 15 minutes drive. Phuket Town is 25 minutes whilst the Phuket International Airport is in 35 minutes. This extremely spacious 1 bedroom condo unit for sale in Kathu comes fully-furnished and includes the FOREIGN FREEHOLD upgrade. It is a ground floor unit fronting a well tended lawn & garden and within sight is the swimming pool. 2 bedroom units also available for sale. descriptions.description: 1 Bedroom Condo for sale in Kamala, PhuketOnly 500 meters from Kamala Beach, this captivating development embodies the vibrant spirit of the area. The goal of the developers was simple: to offer 5-star living at an affordable price making this the perfect property for living in, retirement or investment. This fully furnished 1 bedroom resort condo for sale near Kamala Beach in Phuket offers you more than just a great capital gain on your investment, you are being offered the chance to indulge in a lifestyle choice that few other condo units can provide. The development takes its inspiration from the great cities of the world such as Paris, New York and London (and, yes, even Bangkok!). It is embedded in the architecture and the surrounding walkways, exuding luxury and comfort. Meeting market demands means meeting the buyers needs. The exclusive rooftops offer a sophisticated and upscale environment with amazing sea views. It features 2 infinity pools, fine dining restaurants, a lounge bar and sundecks. The wide range of facilities also include a gym, dance and yoga, a spa, a library, a conference room, a doctor service, a medical/dental/aesthetic clinic in partnership with the Bangkok Hospital Group and a Wellness Center offering personalized Detox and anti-aging solutions. Kamala Beach is only a 5 minute drive. There are numerous restaurants, shops and community facilities around the beach and the village of Kamala. Café del Mar Phuket, a classy beach club belonging to the world-famous brand from Ibiza, is only a 4 minute drive. For more shopping dining and entertainment choices, Patong or the Laguna/Bang Tao/Cherng Talay area are both a 15 minute drive. Phuket International Airport is an easy 36 minute drive. descriptions.description: 1 Bedroom Condo for sale in Kamala, PhuketIdeally placed at the foothills of this expansive blend of forested mountains cascading down to an absolute beach frontage! Situated in the heart of Phuket’s premier master planned community, these lakeside and sea view residences is the island’s latest resort residential development. This prime position provides easy access to the exclusive range of a variety of 4-5 star hotel, leisure, food & beverage and retail outlets, all at your doorstep. Ideally placed on the island’s sought-after sunset coast at Kamala, makes a perfect location for buyers looking to make the most of Phuket’s sophisticated resort lifestyle. On the headland to the south – known as “Millionaire’s Mile” – there are a number of villa and resort developments. You have easy access to a multitude of nearby attractions and activities, including sport and marine facilities, the historic Phuket Town, retail malls, and vibrant nightlife options. World-class education and medical operators can be found within a short drive from Kamala. The master plan has also been designed to include eco-sustainable hillside developments, a medical wellness spa and a luxury retirement community, some of which are in the planning stages. The low-density approach to the site allows for organic community gardens, rainwater harvesting from the natural catchment, and adventure and hiking trails throughout a 200 rai protected rainforest. Owners of these studio beachfront condo for sale in Kamala will enjoy all the trust and confidence attached to a global brand and operator, along with an international management team’s expertise to ensure that their residence is carefully maintained and that its value is protected. From an investor’s perspective, the security offered when purchasing resort residences backed by proven developers and an international operator makes all the difference. Combined with factors such as well-known architects and designers, a prime location within an evolving community and an established destination provides a solid foundation for attractive yields and capital appreciation. 1 Bedroom condo units also available for sale available. Freehold option available. Please contact Thai Residential for details.

This 2 bedroom FOREIGN FREEHOLD condo for sale is only a 5 minute walk to Patong Beach in Phuket. Enjoy the rarity of living in one of a handful of high-rise buildings in Patong, while surrounded by all this beach town has to offer. descriptions.description: 2 Bedroom Condo for sale in Icon Park Phuket Condo, Kathu, PhuketRESALE. Stunning floor to ceiling windows of this 2 bedroom duplex layout gives you an enhanced feeling of space and maximizes not only the (sea) views but also the intake of natural light. The striking design and appearance of this iconic condominium concept stands out from its surroundings. Set on a spacious 2 Rai of land, the project’s layout is designed to make full use of the area, offering you easy access and convenient living. Using Amphitheatric concept for the landscaping, the original contours of the land has been maintained and as a result you’ve got a peaceful and natural ambiance within the grounds. The car parking is located underground, not only for your convenience, but also to preserve the projects clean appearance. In addition, you have direct access from the elevator into your own private corridor, for convenience and security. This development certainly offers you tranquility from the outside to the inside. The interior is spacious and is based on a Scandinavian concept, modern and contemporary, light and airy. Floor to ceiling windows, which encompass most of the wall area, make the most of the natural sunlight. Paired with light colored hardwood floors, such as ash, the feeling of space and air increases, creating a comfortable and positive environment to live in. Details such as iron chandeliers, sconces and classy table lamps add extra light when the evening comes. Also commonly found in Scandinavian design is wall moldings and stenciled borders around doorways. This 2 bedroom condo for sale at Icon Park near Kamala Beach in Phuket comes fully furnished and the ownership is FOREIGN FREEHOLD. Within walking distance are Kamala Beach, shops, bars, restaurants, banks and other community facilities and amenities. Within 5 to 10 minutes drive are Laem Singh Beach, Surin Beach, Patong Beach and all that Patong has to offer. Golf courses are 20 minutes away. Phuket International Airport is a 30 minute drive. descriptions.description: 1 Bedroom Condo for sale in Oceana Condo, Kamala, PhuketThe design of this Ocean View Condo for Sale in Kamala is derived from its exquisite hillside position, overlooking the picturesque waters of the Andaman Sea. The location delivers magnificent views of Kamala Beach as well as breathtaking mountains, showcasing the beauty of Phuket’s west coast. Near enough to the laidback Kamala Beach yet still close enough to venture to the bustling Patong Beach when the mood strikes, this location is prime for those who appreciate balance in life. This contemporary development consists of 126 spacious condo units across 3 residential buildings, each with 8 floors. In addition to the breathtaking views and optimal location, residents are also able to take advantage of several luxurious facilities. Amenities available to residents include a refreshing swimming pool, state of the art fitness center, 24-hour security, car parking, and a rejuvenating spa. This studio unit has a total of 32 square meter living space and can be purchased foreign freehold.

titles.title: Studio Foreign Freehold Sea View Condo for Sale at Oceana Resort in Kamala, Phuket.

descriptions.description: 1 Bedroom Condo for sale in Oceana Phuket resort, Kamala, PhuketRESALE. Oceana Resort Phuket is nestled in a peaceful hillside setting, offering magnificent views of the Andaman Sea and the town of Kamala. Kamala Beach is a mere 300 meters away. A diamond is the inspiration for this condominium. Like the diamond’s facets is intended to maximise the beauty of the jewel from any direction, the design of this condominium is intended to maximise views in every direction. The architectural appearance of this condo is quite unique and distinctive, vastly unlike the typical condos found today. This studio condo for sale is FOREIGN FREEHOLD and comes fully furnished. It has a soft interior colour scheme and floor-to-ceiling windows. The bedroom has stylish sliding glass doors, which open onto a spacious balcony overlooking the sea. The condo features attractive commercial frontage that brings further convenience and benefits to its residents. The condo prides itself on being a family friendly resort. Features include a common area pool with plenty of space for residents and guests to lounge under the sun, swim, splash and play. Each pool has a unique ambiance and tropical setting and there is a convenient pool bar service for snacks and refreshments throughout the day. For those who want to keep fit, there is a fully equipped fitness centre/gym and a spa. Whilst those with kids will be thankful for the kid’s club! Oceana Resort Phuket is conveniently located for minimarts, local shops, fresh markets, and restaurants. Some of the best golfing in Phuket is only 30 minutes away. And if you crave more choices for shopping, restaurants and a more exciting nightlife, Patong is only a 15 minute drive. Phuket International Airport is a 45 minute drive. This is truly Five-Star living at a fantastic price! Additional studio, 1 bedroom and 2 bedroom units also available for sale at Oceana Resort Phuket in Kamala. Other studio condo also available for sale near Kamala Beach, Phuket. Please contact Thai Residential for details.

On-site facilities will include a roof-top pool and lounge area, a fully equipped fitness centre, a wellness centre and and on-site restaurant. A walking distance of 850 meters to the ever popular Patong Beach makes this 1 bedroom condo an idyllic holiday home or a great investment for rental income. As Phuket continues to flourish, there has never been a better time to purchase a holiday home on this popular island. Phuket truly offers a little bit of something for everyone. Not only are there great beaches, but there is abundant nightlife, shopping and dining choices as well as all of the conveniences and necessities of a Western country. Properties like this do not stay on the market for long, so now is the time to act. This 1 bedroom condo is scheduled for completion on December 2023 and is available on a freehold or leasehold basis. A 7% NET guarantee yield for 15 years is being offered. Additional/Other 1 bedroom condo units also available for sale near Patong Beach, Phuket.

titles.title: 1 Bedroom Sea View Foreign Freehold Condo for Sale near Patong Beach, Phuket.

descriptions.description: 1 Bedroom Condo for sale in Patong, PhuketLocated on the hills of Patong, a prime location for those who seek tranquility but still want to be close to the colorful scenes, the beach and the nightlife. This unique project features a gorgeous Sino-Portuguese theme which accentuates the beautiful traditional architecture of Phuket. Stretching over 10,000 sqm of land with only 122 elegant units ensures ample privacy for all residents and/or owners. This 1 bedroom fully furnished, FOREIGN FREEHOLD condo for sale near Patong Beach on the West Coast of Phuket, offers a marvelous panoramic view of the exciting town of Patong and the Andaman Sea. You can enjoy magnificent sea views during the day, stunning sunsets over the Andaman Sea at dusk and the glittering night lights of Patong in the evenings. The contemporary design of this unit has been crafted for a sense of space optimization and quality living. It comes with a turn-key service including custom-made furniture and household items. This sea view resort condo is built towards providing a perfect environment for investment or full-time residence. Facilities and amenities include a magnificent sea view restaurant, sea view infinity pool and pool bar, spa and sauna, fitness centre, kids club, garden areas, 24 hour lobby, 24 hour security and an electronic key card access. Services include free WiFi, buggy service, free shuttle bus and a convenience store or minimart. Patong Beach is a 4 minute drive whilst Jungceylon is in 7 minutes. There is no shortfall of dining, shopping, leisure and entertainment pursuits in Patong, either within walking distance or a short drive. Phuket International Airport is a 45 minute drive. Card A guaranteed return program is on offer for 8% over 5 years or a total of 40%. Additional 1 bedroom and 2 condo units also available for sale. titles.title: 2 Bedroom Apartment for Rent in Patong Beach.

descriptions.description: 2 Bedroom Condo for rent in Patong, Phuket2 Bedroom Apartment for Rent in Patong Beach These two bedroom apartments are situated on the upper floors of the building providing great views of Patong city and the green mountainside. The 95-105 sqm suites can comfortably sleep four adults with two king-size bedrooms making this a good option for families with children or friends that prefer to share accommodation expenses. Options for extra beds are also available upon request. The master bedroom features glass sliding doors that open onto a private balcony, a furnished outdoor living space that can also be accessed from the lounge area. Both the master bedroom and the second bedroom have en-suite bathrooms with showers, and in some of the apartments, there is a third guest toilet for added convenience. The spacious living area is bright and welcoming decorated in earth tones creating a warm, contemporary look. The open plan room has wall to ceiling windows next to the comfortable sofas ideal for socializing and browsing the Cable TV channels. The dining area and kitchen are complete with all the cookware and tableware required to prepare main meals. Minimum rental term is 6 months.

titles.title: CYAN Luxury Developments.

descriptions.description: 1 Bedroom Condo for rent in Kamala, PhuketThis condominium is conveniently located just a couple of minutes’ walk from the pristine and sandy Kamala Beach, eateries, shops as well as all local facilities. There are 2 buildings x 5 storeys, they contain a total of 40 modern studios each 55+ sqm in size and come with a kitchenette, dining area, living area, work desk and a balcony/terrace. Facilities within this resort-style condo include a good-sized communal swimming pool with a shallow kids pool, ample pool terrace, and restaurant and bar. Location: Well located just a few minutes stroll from either the southern part of Kamala Beach or Kamala high street where there are a number of eateries, local shops, bars and convenience stores. Big C supermarket is reachable within a couple of minutes drive away. Nearby Beach Clubs: Café Del Mar Phuket Beach Club ( 1.3 km. ) HQ Beach Lounge Phuket ( 1.3 km. ) Bluesiam Beach Club ( 3.9 km. ) Lux Beach Phuket Club ( 4.3 km. ) Nearby Beaches: Kamala Beach ( 0.3 km. ) Laem Singh Beach ( 2.2 km. ) Surin Beach ( 2.9 km. ) Pansea Beach ( 3.7 km. ) Nearby Golf Courses: Red Mountain Golf Club Phuket ( 6.8 km. ) Loch Palm Golf Club ( 6.8 km. ) Laguna Golf Phuket ( 7.1 km. ) Phuket Country Club Golf ( 8.5 km. ) Nearby Hospitals: Patong Hospital ( 6.3 km. ) Thalang Hospital ( 10.3 km. ) Bangkok Hospital Siriroj ( 11 km. ) Bangkok International Hospital ( 11.5 km. ) Nearby Marinas: Phuket Boat Lagoon ( 11.5 km. ) Royal Phuket Marina ( 12.1 km. ) Ao Po Grand Marina ( 22.1 km. ) Phuket Yacht Haven Marina ( 25.2 km. ) Nearby Schools: Kajonkiet International School ( 9.7 km. ) British International School ( 9.7 km. ) QSI International School of Phuket ( 10 km. ) HeadStart International School ( 11.3 km. ) Nearby Shopping Malls: Lotus's Choengtalay ( 4.6 km. ) Porto de Phuket ( 5.3 km. ) Boat Avenue Mall Cherngtalay ( 5.5 km. ) Central Patong ( 6.6 km. ) Nearby Tourist Attraction: Phuket Fantasea ( 1 km. ) Bang Wan Waterfall ( 2.2 km. ) Catch Beach Club ( 4.4 km. ) Kathu Waterfall ( 4.8 km. )

titles.title: Kamala; 1 Bed Condo, Fully Renovated.

descriptions.description: 1 Bedroom Condo for rent in The Trees Residence, Kamala, PhuketTHERE IS A 3D HOME TOUR AVAILABLE FOR THIS PROPERTY. CLICK THE 3D TAB, PRESS PLAY AND THEN PRESS PLAY IN THE BOTTOM LEFT CORNER. EXPLORE AT ANYTIME AND PRESS PLAY TO RESUME. This 80m2 FOREIGN FREEHOLD unit is perfectly located on the entry level (no steps) of a mid level building that is close to the swimming pool. The owner has fully renovated the unit to an extremely high standard and this is now very likely the best conditioned and most modern unit in the entire development. The owner has replaced all of the floors, changed the entire lighting system to LED and completely replaced the air-conditioning. Everything in this unit is new as it was stripped back to a shell and completely re-built. The bathroom has been completely re-fitted with new non-slip floors, white marble counter, quartz mosaics wall, new shower, new toilet and all new cupboards. The walls have been completely tiled (instead of painted). All fittings are from Hafele. The kitchen is brand new and professionally fully fitted by a leading designer. Appliances include a new 4 ring induction cooker, steam/traditional oven, fridge freezer, hoods, Indian black granite counter tops and ample storage space. All crockery and cutlery are new and complete. The living room furniture, bed and all fitted storage space and wardrobe are all new. The Italian sofa bed is a useful option for any children. This superb unit is available for sale and long-term rent only. The monthly rental rate quoted is for a 12 month lease. Shorter rentals from a minimum of one month will vary in cost according to length of stay and the season. Electricity, water, tv and internet are not included in the rental rate and other contracted services, such as laundry or cleaning and other services that maybe required by the Tenant are in addition to the rental rate. Please contact us directly at Lazudi for more information or to view this fully renovated freehold 1 bed unit for rent in Kamala, Phuket. Any questions please quote the following listing ID 16942 when calling.More properties like this can be found at Lazudi.com, where you can find over 50,000 available properties for For Sale in Thailand. See more about this specific property and others like it here https://lazudi.com/th-en/phuket/property/kamala;-1-bed-condo-fully-renovated-16942.

titles.title: Spacious 2 Bedroom Apartment for Rent in Kamala.

descriptions.description: 2 Bedroom Condo for rent in Kamala, PhuketThis 2 Bedroom Apartment for Rent in Kamala has a contemporary with central open-plan living space which has floor-to-ceiling sliding glass doors running the entire width of the room. The elevation ensures that cooling sea breezes, which sweep up the valley, are optimised throughout the year, and they also give amazing views of the untamed verdant jungle and hills. The living area is furnished with a comfortable sofa which faces a wall-mounted flat-screen TV, whilst the thick wooden central island separating the kitchen from the living area doubles as a food preparation space and a dining table. The kitchen is fitted with high-gloss cream units and equipped with an integrated oven, with four ring hob and extractor hood above and a tall fridge/freezer. The guest bedroom is spacious and furnished with a king-size bed facing a wall-mounted flat-screen TV, ample fitted wardrobes and a well-appointed en-suite shower room. Full-height sliding doors at the rear open onto a private covered terrace area which enables the doors to remain open whatever the weather for natural ventilation. The master bedroom is also spacious and has a king-size bed facing a feature wall housing a flat-screen TV with console below, and has twin fitted double wardrobes and a vanity unit. The oversize en-suite has a large walk-in shower and sliding doors leading to the exterior sun-lounging deck and rear courtyard. The deck has an inset Jacuzzi and the area is surrounded by lush tropical foliage so you feel close to nature. There is a communal swimming pool which looks out over the valley and the surrounding untamed mountains, as well as a communal relaxation area and sunbathing terraces. Rental Rates: Low Season : 1 May – 15 Oct Monthly 60,000 Baht / Weekly 25,000 Baht / Daily 4,000 Baht. Mid Season 1-30 Apr +15-31 Oct Monthly 60,000 Baht / Weekly 30,000 Baht / Daily 4,500 Baht. High Season : 01 Nov-15 Dec & 01 Feb – 31 Mar Monthly 85,000 Baht / Weekly 35,000 Baht / Daily 7,000 Baht. Peak Season : 15 Dec – 31 Jan Monthly 110,000 Baht / Weekly 45,000 Baht / Daily 8,000 Baht. Kitchen / Living / Dining Area: Comfortable sofaWall-mounted flat-screen TVFood preparation space and a dining tableOvenFour ring hob and extractor hoodA tall fridge/freezerOutdoor Features: Private covered terraceSun-lounging deckCourtyardInset JacuzziCommunal swimming poolSunbathingSun bedsServices : Fitness gymSaunaNon smoking roomsInternet access – wireless (complimentary)Linen change : 1 time/weekWi – fiRoom cleaningFree shuttle service to kamala beach 6 times a day1 time cleaning per weekOn site restaurantTo arrange a viewing or if you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to contact us on +66 (0)87 8923876 or via email; [email protected]

titles.title: Kamala; 3 Bed High Floor Oceanview.

descriptions.description: 3 Bedroom Condo for rent in The Plantation, Kamala, PhuketA superb 3 bed unit for rent is located within a very sought after development along Millionaires Mile in Kamala, Phuket. Likely one of the best units available in the development due to the spectacular views. The three bedrooms can sleep 4-6 people. The master bedroom has a large en-suite bathroom and king sized bed. The guest bedroom has a large en-suite bathroom and queen sized bed. The third bedroom has attached half bath and queen leather sleeping sofa bed. This rooms currently serves as a study/bedroom. Tastefully furnished and decorated, this three bedroom condo directly overlooks the Andaman Sea. It features spacious living areas opening onto an expansive shaded terrace, with superb views from every front facing room. Large glass sliding doors disappear into pockets that seamlessly blend indoor and outdoor areas together. The apartment has a modern kitchen with dish washer, refrigerator, electric range, microwave oven, toaster and coffee maker. Fully equipped with linens and kitchen and dinnerware for ten. Laundry and storage within the apartment. Common facilities include 24 hour security, on-site management office, swimming pool, party & aerobics area, private parking, lounge and well-equipped gym. Bright and airy with comfortable outdoor furniture for meals, lounging or simply taking a nap. Ideal for couples and families seeking seeking privacy in a romantic setting with sunsets. titles.title: Kamala; 3 Bed Condo with Superb Views.

descriptions.description: 3 Bedroom Condo for rent in Kamala, PhuketThis is a bright, spacious three-bedroom condo for rent in a quiet Kamala location has expansive sea views. Entry is directly into a very large open-plan living/dining area with a kitchen at the rear. The front facing wall is constructed of floor-to-ceiling sliding glass doors which give views out across the valley floor to the sparkling waters of Kamala Bay. The seating section is to the right and furnished with a long modern black leather L-shaped sofa facing a wall-mounted, flat-screen TV with a long fitted console below housing a DVD player. The dining area is to the left and has a long light-wood dining table and six chairs. The kitchen is to the rear and fully fitted with cream high-gloss units and cupboards, having a grey terrazzo counter. It is equipped with a four-ring hob with extractor hood above and an integrated oven below, plus a tall fridge/freezer. There is also an automatic washing machine discreetly located inside a tall cupboard. To the far end of the living area is the master bedroom. This has waist-height sliding louvred panels which retract to give views to sea whilst reclining in bed, whilst the other wall is sliding glass doors which lead to the balcony. The en-suite bathroom is reached via a walk-through wardrobe and has a moulded terrazzo wash basin with storage below and a full-width mirror above giving added dimension. There is also a glass panelled walk-in shower. A hallway adjacent to the kitchen leads to the two further bedrooms, the smaller of which is to the left at the end of the hallway. This has a double bed, bedside cabinets and triple fitted wardrobe with storage cupboards above. The main bathroom is next along the corridor and has a half bath, glass walk-in shower cubicle with rain-shower head and a moulded terrazzo wash basin, again with storage below and a long mirror above. The final bedroom is spacious, with two sets of full-height sliding glass doors making it bright and well ventilated. There are two double and one single fitted wardrobes, with cupboards above providing ample storage, whilst the double bed also has a tall cupboard to the side and cupboards above as an extra convenience. The windows look out onto lush untouched jungle foliage. Externally, a walkway extends across the front of the condo, widening to a covered balcony at the side which has plenty of space for relaxed seating and an alfresco dining set. The condo is bright, spacious and open and the numerous opening patio windows throughout enable it to be naturally ventilated thanks to the cooling breezes afforded at this elevation. Within the development there is a pool with surrounding terraces for sun-bathing, plus a quiet relaxation room and an area of hanging chairs for quiet contemplation. Tenants can also utilise the facilities of an adjoining resort which include squash court, tennis court, gym and poolside restaurant and bar. The development is located just a short distance from the centre of the popular village of Kamala on Phuket's west coast, which offers all amenities such as banks, shops, bars and a wide variety of restaurants serving both Thai and International foods, plus a long sandy beach. Patong can be reached within a 15 minute drive, as can the up-scale wine bars and restaurants at beautiful Surin Beach, whilst the airport is approximately a 40 minute drive away. Please contact us directly at Lazudi for more information or to view this 3 bed condo for rent in Kamala, Phuket.Any questions please quote the following listing ID 16904 when calling.More properties like this can be found at Lazudi.com, where you can find over 50,000 available properties for For Sale in Thailand. See more about this specific property and others like it here https://lazudi.com/th-en/phuket/property/kamala;-3-bed-condo-with-superb-views-16904.

The master bedroom with queen size bed also over looks the swimming pools with an en suite with baht tub and shower, both guest bedrooms share 2nd bathroom with a large walk-in shower. titles.title: Kamala: 2 Bed Seaview Condo.

descriptions.description: 2 Bedroom Condo for rent in Kamala, PhuketThis is a bright, open and airy condominium located in a peaceful development and surrounded by lush tropical jungle. The condo is built on clean lines in a contemporary style, with stylish touches. The central living space is open plan and has floor-to-ceiling sliding glass doors which run the entire width of the room. The elevation ensures that cooling sea breezes, which sweep up the valley, are optimised throughout the year. In addition they supply lovely panoramic views across the valley floor to the distant sea. The living area is furnished with a comfortable sofa which faces a wall-mounted flat-screen TV, whilst the central dining area with its oblong table and four chairs is separated from the kitchen by an island. This supplies not only space for food preparation but doubles as a breakfast bar also. The kitchen is fitted with high-gloss white units and equipped with an integrated oven, with four ring hob and extractor hood above and a tall fridge/freezer. The guest bedroom is furnished with a queen-size bed and double wardrobes, whilst the master bedroom has a king-size bed facing a feature wall housing a flat-screen TV with console below, and has twin fitted double wardrobes. The main bathroom has dual access to the living area or directly to the master bedroom, and is fitted with a long modern trough-style basin and walk-in shower. There is a communal swimming pool which looks out over the valley and the surrounding untamed mountains, as well as a communal relaxation area and sunbathing terraces. The development is located at the back of the popular village of Kamala, within a short drive to the beach and the bustling village with shops, bars and a wide variety of restaurants. A shuttle service is supplied by the resort to transport guests to and from the beach and village. The airport is approximately 35 minutes away, with the entertainment and shopping malls of Patong reached within a 15 minute drive. Facilities include; .Parking Structure .Shuttle Bus Service .Communal Swimming Pool .Wireless Internet Security Systems .Security Guards .CCTV Surveillance Systems.Any questions please quote the following listing ID 16929 when calling.More properties like this can be found at Lazudi.com, where you can find over 50,000 available properties for For Sale in Thailand. titles.title: Studio Sea View Freehold Condo for Sale near Kamala Beach, Phuket.

descriptions.description: 1 Bedroom Condo for sale in Kamala, PhuketSPECIAL PROMOTION! Located only 180 metres from Kamala Beach and a few minutes walking distance from luxury hotels, top restaurants and internationally awarded places such as Cafe Del Mar. This fully furnished studio resort condo for sale near Kamala Beach in Phuket is FOREIGN FREEHOLD option. Tastefully decorated, a fusion of Japanese, Chinese and Thai decor makes for a one-of-a-kind interior. Built on a 32,923 sqm prime plot of land, this is a luxury resort condominium project designed to provide the best lifestyle environment for the guests. With over 10,000 sqm of common areas, the guests will enjoy the multiple swimming pools, fitness, restaurants, and recreation areas. Take in the landscaped gardens or admire the mountain views. Alternatively, marvel at the spectacular shoreline of the Andaman Sea. The project, will be managed by a well known hotel management company to ensure maximum occupancy, high yields and world class management services. This is a turnkey investment for the savvy investor with a 7% net rental guarantee for 5 years (no common fees apply) with the option to renew. In addition, investors can take advantage of the buyback option after 5 years at 110%, ensuring an attractive 10% capital appreciation. The resort condo is only 5 minutes away from the famous Millionaires Mile Road on the West Coast of Phuket. Flanked by multi-million dollar Villas, 5 Star Resorts and the Palaces of Thai Royalty, this is surely the place to be. Patong Beach can be reached in just 15 min and Phuket International Airport within 35 minutes. Additional studio condo units also available for sale at varying sizes and prices. Units are available on a freehold or leasehold basis with a choice of sea view, garden view or pool view. Other studio condo units also available for sale near Kamala Beach, Phuket. titles.title: 2 Bedroom Sea View Foreign Freehold Condo for Sale by Owner at The Residence Kalim Bay in Patong, Phuket.

descriptions.description: 2 Bedroom Condo for sale in Patong, PhuketRESALE. Sea-facing Thai-style buildings situated at the quiet north end of Patong Beach. Situated a stone’s throw away from Kalim Beach, a fine stretch of powdery white sand rimmed by coconut palms at a shore where fishermen occasionally still cast nets in the early hours of dawn. Just cross the street for some snorkeling and swimming. The Residence Kalim Bay is built with the finest of natural materials such as teak, terracotta and cane. This 2 bedroom condo for sale by the owner comes fully furnished and is FOREIGN FREEHOLD. It is on the 2nd floor with a good sized balcony facing seawards, all the better to appreciate the sea views and Phuket’s fabulous sunsets. There is a large and beautifully designed swimming pool with a bar nestled amidst the tropical Thai garden. Relaxing deckchairs offer you a place to enjoy the sun and relax at the pool with family and friends. Next door are a few pubs, eateries and restaurants , massage-salons, laundry service, scooter-rent and taxi/tuk tuk service. Just around the corner are some food vendors. The center of Patong, with the bigger shops, bars and restaurants, Jungceylon and Central is only less than 5 minutes drive away or a 20 minute walk. This 2 bedroom condo is close to the action yet far enough away to be quiet. Whether you are enjoying the legendary Phuket sunsets from your private balcony, or a cocktail at the pool bar, this oasis of splendour and relaxation is still only a few minutes’ drive (or walk!) from the nightlife that Patong is famous for. Conveniently located for golf courses, hospitals and international schools. Phuket International Airport is 30 km away. Additional 2 bedroom condo units also available for sale at The Residence Kalim Bay. Other 2 bedroom condo units also available for sale near Kalim Beach in Patong, Phuket. Please contact Thai Residential for details.

descriptions.description:
2 Bedroom Condo for sale in The Plantation, Kamala, PhuketSelling price 25 mln THB Total area 249 sqm In house area 180 sqm Ownership: Thai freehold under Thai company PROPERTY FEATURES: 2-bed 2-bath condominium (Both bedrooms with ensuite) Impressive Andaman Sea view Outdoor terrace with jacuzzi Both bathrooms with double vanities Open-plan living and dining area Fully-equipped western kitchen with breakfast bar Study Formal dining room Spacious sea view terrace Guest WC Laundry area COMMUNITY FEATURES: Communal swimming pool Gym Car parking 24-hour security
Situated on a hillside along Millionaire’s Mile in Kamala, this fabulous apartment in The Plantation estate is set just a couple of minutes drive from Kamala town and sandy beach. Featuring over 249 sqm of the total living space, this condo contains 2 spacious bedrooms both with ensuite bathrooms, an open-plan living and dining area, a European style kitchen with a breakfast bar, a formal indoor dining table, a study and a large partially roofed terrace overlooking Kamala Bay and the Andaman Sea. Apart from the larger size of the room, the master bedroom comes with ensuite bathroom with double sinks yet it hides a lovely private sea-facing terrace where you can find an outdoor jacuzzi, clear glass bar table and outdoor seatings with a patio umbrella. The second bedroom can be found towards the rear of the apartment, right adjacent to the living area and has an ensuite bathroom also with double vanities. Ideal for relaxation and any gatherings is the extensive private covered terrace where there are a 6-seat alfresco dining table, a daybed, outdoor sofa sets and sun loungers. This property is sold partially furnished as some personal unique items of the owners are not included and to be advised upon visit and purchase agreement. Prime location: This sea view condo is located in the hillside Plantation development and is only 10 minutes walk or just a couple of minutes drive from Kamala Beach, restaurants, shops, low-key bars and also from Kamala centre with more choices of eateries, nightlife sites and Bic C mall. Patong Beach can be reached within a 15-minute car ride, while Phuket International Airport is approximately 50-minute drive away.

This 4 bedroom sea view FOREIGN FREEHOLD penthouse condo with private pool for sale at Kamala Falls, Phuket has been custom designed for spacious living. It has a floor area of 430 sqm and ceiling heights in excess of 3m. Fully furnished, it includes all designer furniture, custom kitchen, sanitary equipment, washing machine and dryer. One of the most stunning features is the 10m x 4m swimming pool set in a large outdoor, partially covered terrace. There are 2 lounge areas, a huge dining room, a separate laundry with storage and a private staircase area. Glass sliding doors wrap around the master bedroom and front side of the building ensuring beautiful sea and forest vistas. All in all, a perfect tropical living space for you, your family and friends to enjoy. Ideally situated between the vibrant nightlife of Patong and the more sedate Kamala on the beautiful west coast, Kamala Falls offer a perfect balance of all that Phuket has to offer. Perfect for living or generating excellent returns as an investment property. Kamala has a wide array of and offers easy access to lifestyle, entertainment and dining options, whilst retaining its own ambiance and charm. Phuket International Airport is a 42 minute drive. titles.title: 2 Bedroom Foreign Freehold Duplex Penthouse Condo for Sale at Icon Park near Kamala Beach, Phuket.

descriptions.description: 2 Bedroom Condo for sale in Kamala, PhuketRESALE. Price Reduced! Stunning floor to ceiling windows of this 2 bedroom duplex layout at Icon Park, gives you an enhanced feeling of space and maximizes not only the views but also the intake of natural light and fresh air. The striking design and appearance of this iconic condominium concept stands out from its surroundings. Set on a spacious 2 Rai of land, the project’s layout is designed to make full use of the area, offering you easy access and convenient living. Using Amphitheatric concept for the landscaping, the original contours of the land has been maintained and as a result you’ve got a peaceful and natural ambiance within the grounds. The car parking is located underground, not only for your convenience, but also to preserve the projects clean appearance. In addition, you have direct access from the elevator into your own private corridor, for convenience and security. This development certainly offers you tranquility from the outside to the inside. The interior is spacious and is based on a Scandinavian concept, modern and contemporary, light and airy. Floor to ceiling windows, which encompass most of the wall area, make the most of the natural sunlight. Paired with light colored hardwood floors, such as ash, the feeling of space and air increases, creating a comfortable and positive environment to live in. Details such as iron chandeliers, sconces and classy table lamps add extra light when the evening comes. Also commonly found in Scandinavian design is wall moldings and stenciled borders around doorways. This 2 bedroom FOREIGN FREEHOLD duplex penthouse condo for sale at Icon Park near Kamala Beach in Phuket comes fully furnished. Within walking distance are Kamala Beach, shops, bars, restaurants, banks and other community facilities and amenities. Within 5 to 10 minutes drive are Laem Singh Beach, Surin Beach, Patong Beach and all that Patong has to offer. Golf courses are 20 minutes away. Phuket International Airport is a 30 minute drive. Additional 1 bedroom or 2 bedroom condo units also available for sale at Icon Park. Other 1 bedroom or 2 bedroom condo units also available for sale near Kamala Beach, Phuket. Please contact Thai Residential [email protected] for details.

titles.title: 1 Bedroom Condo Near the Beach - Patong, Phuket.

descriptions.description: 1 Bedroom Condo for sale in Patong, PhuketWALKING DISTANCE TO FREEDOM BEACH & TRI-TRANG BEACH! This amazing new development is only a few minutes away from several beaches, such as Paradise Beach and Patong Beach. Both beaches are less than 5 minutes away via free shuttle buses. If you prefer to take a walk, Freedom beach and Tri Trang beach are only minutes away by foot. Surrounded by beaches, this new holiday retreat offers one of the best, if not the best view of the Andaman Sea surrounding the beautiful island of Phuket. If you happen to not feel like going to the beach, there are plenty of other activities to participate in. For starters you can laze the day away at the 7,000 sqm state-of-the-art swimming pool with its very own pool bar. Or perhaps relax at the spa, enjoying a relaxing wellness program. Or you could also hit the gym to work on your fitness-level. You could also make use of the conference rooms and it’s facilities, so you can hold your meetings without having to leave the condo. Feeling peckish? You can visit the mini-mart and stock up on drinks and some snacks and chill in your very own private jacuzzi on your balcony.Or if you want something more fancy, visit the on site restaurant and choose among the wide variety of local and western cuisine. The lobby is open 24 hours a day and gives you the opportunity to get any support you want within minutes of your enquiry. Join this project today and secure yourself a great investment opportunity, including a lucrative rental guarantee for 15 years. There are no monthly fees, no electricity fees, no maintenance fees and no sinking fund for a 15 year period. After a 10 year period, a buy back option is on offer at the original price. And at the end it is even possible to renegotiate a new rental guarantee. Scheduled for completion in 2022. Please contact Thai Residential for details.

titles.title: 4 BED PENTHOUSE WITH SEA VIEWS.

descriptions.description:
4 Bedroom Condo for sale in Kamala, Phuket4 bed Penthouse properties are rare on Phuket. However, we have one for you, and it comes with a huge terrace and knock-out sea views. No, I’m not exaggerating. Imagine if you will, a luxury apartment with over 428 sqm covered area. Now, if you living in Hong Kong or Singapore, that sqm. is equivalent to your local Ikea, or nearly. So its pretty big. And, we can’t think of an Ikea with tropical sea views! Ok, that might be a little light-hearted, but seriously, this penthouse has to be seen to be believed. Either side of the colonnade lined hallway are two expansive guest bedrooms, both with tasteful en-suites as standard. The dining area is spacious and large enough to accommodate 8 guests comfortably. The main living and relaxation area is set slightly lower than the rest of the residence making the area both functional and easy on the eye. The European kitchen is a delight to use, well equipped, and spacious. A separate laundry room is next to the kitchen and comes with washing machine and dryer. The is also a maids quarters too. To each side of the living room lays the main bedroom areas. The master bedroom is spacious, 94 sqm spacious. This may give you some idea of how “roomy” this penthouse suite really is. Outside is the perfect place to relax, dine, drink, entertain…or read a good book.
The price approximately USD 4,290,000 m.

titles.title: 1-2 Bedroom Super Luxury Freehold Condo for Sale with Stunning Sea Views Overlooking Patong Beach, Phuket.

descriptions.description: 2 Bedroom Condo for sale in Bluepoint Condominium, Patong, PhuketRESALE. This is a rare opportunity to purchase this amazing 1/2 bedroom foreign freehold condo, which can only be referred to as the epitome of luxury. It’s amazing views are matched by the unique style, layout and immaculate interior design. The price includes full furnishings of exceptional quality, all carefully selected to maximise the aesthetic and luxurious feel. For anyone seeking a truly unique home with an ultimate living experience close to the heart of Phuket’s most vibrant area, they will be spellbound by the unparalleled lavishness which has created a truly tranquil and private inner sanctum. The modern architectural design of the development has been perfectly complimented by interior design of the very highest standards. Nearly every item within this home has been imported from Europe. The condo has currently been converted into a spacious one bedroom with a King size bed with a large ensuite walk-in closet (bedroom number 2) and a full guest bathroom. It has a huge Italian Valcucine designer kitchen and large living and dining area. There is also a top of the range Bang & Olufsen Audio/TV system. The floor to ceiling glass windows in the living area ensure there is plenty of fresh air and sunshine, complementing beautifully the surrounding natural environment and stunning views looking north across Patong Bay and the turquoise blue Andaman Sea. This well managed resort also has a communal pool with sea views and a modern fully-equipped gymnasium. It is located just 10 min away from Patong center with its stunning night lights, bars and restaurants. In just a few minutes’ drive there are five stunning beaches, including the quiet southern tip of Patong Beach, the tranquil Tri-Trang Beach, and some of Phuket Island’s best kept secret beaches just a little further down the headland; Paradise, Merlin and Freedom beaches. This condo is situated in one of Phuket’s most modern and awarded condominium developments, Bluepoint, renowned for its innovative design and attention to detail. Bluepoint is now recognized as a unique 5-star condominium, the only one of its kind on the Southwest Coast of Phuket. Its dedicated team of leading industry professionals including award-winning designer Paul Raff Studio from Toronto, Canada, have worked together to create the perfect home for anyone seeking luxury island living. Bluepoint truly is a development in a class of its own. This is an excellent investment opportunity or a beautiful bachelor pad or holiday home set in one of Phuket’s most sought after areas. Additional 2 bedroom and 3 bedroom condo units also available for sale at Bluepoint Condos. Other 2 bedroom condo units also available for sale near Patong Beach, Phuket. Please contact Thai Residential for details.

descriptions.description:
1 Bedroom Condo for sale in Patong, PhuketSale price starting from :฿ 3,120,000 / $ 103,96
Modern condominium five minutes from the beach, This brand new condominium is conveniently located between Karon Beach and Patong Beach, recognized as a TOP tourist destination in Phuket. Situated only 5 minutes away from gorgeous beaches, your holidays will be the perfect mix of the peaceful lifestyle in Karon Beach and the fantastic nightlife in Patong City.
The project consist of a total of 6 condominium buildings and 6 villa buildings for a total of 243 one- and two-bedroom units. Garden view/pool view/sea view.
Units can be purchased freehold and leasehold and construction starts the 3rd quarter of 2020. Completed in 2022 Land info: Hill Building Info:Off plan 3 Floors Rental program Security/Gated Estate Restaurant Gym Community pool Management office
Studio (24 sq.m. and 30 sq.m.) One-bedroom apartment (45 sq.m. and 53 sq.m.) The presented apartments are cozy studios, made in a modern design, using light colors to make your stay as comfortable as possible. Every detail is thought out here, and panoramic windows create additional space and fill the apartment with natural light.
Investment attractiveness: Guaranteed return 7% for 3 years (30 days free stay per year). After 3 years - rental pool 70/30 (up to 90 days of free stay per year). Estimated Rental Return from 7% up to 11.5%. Available option - Freehold.
Payment Schedule: Deposit - 100,000 THB. Upon signing the contract - 35%. Start of construction - 25%. Foundation completion - 15%. Concrete structure completion - 15%. Hand over- 10%.
The developer also offers an alternative payment schedule with a 2-year installment plan. This is a great option for those who decide to make money on Phuket real estate.
Common area facilities and amenities include lobby, concierge service, lift key card system, restaurant, swimming pool, fitness center, spa, sky terrace, catering exclusive, business center, guest butler, laundry care, valet parking and minibus transport to the beach.

2 Bedroom Condo for sale in Patong, PhuketThis 63 sqm 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom foreign freehold mountain view condo is located on the 17th floor of Patong Tower, the highest building in Patong, and the famous Patong beach is just a few minutes walk away.

titles.title: 3 Bedroom Foreign Freehold Sea View Penthouse Condo for Sale by Owner at Diamond Condominium near Patong Beach, Phuket.

descriptions.description: 3 Bedroom Condo for sale in Patong, PhuketRESALE. A sea view condominium located on a hillside in a quiet area only 3 mins drive to the beach, shopping center and night life of Patong. The main road where there are restaurants, coffee shops, convenience stores and community facilities is only a 3 minute walk down the hill. This 3 bedroom FOREIGN FREEHOLD sea view penthouse condo for sale by the owner at Diamond Condominium near Patong Beach, Phuket has a stunning view of the mountains and the sea. The condominium consists of only 6 floors and 16 units, which gives it a level of privacy and exclusivity. This is an excellent investment, due to it’s favorable location, and will always generate income through rent. Patong is the busiest tourism area on the island. This seaside town has more people per square mile than any other part of the island, including Phuket Town. That’s because you just can’t find more entertainment in any other parts of Phuket. From bars, restaurants, massage parlours, shopping and shows, Patong has it all. This has obviously led to a huge demand for Patong real estate. Patong is by far the easiest place to rent your property and achieve consistent occupancy rates. Jungceylon Shopping Center, Bangla Night Street and many International Restaurants, Bars and shops are all less than a 10 minute drive away. Karon Beach is a 7 minute drive whilst Phuket International Airport is a 1 hour drive. Additional 2 bedroom condo unit also available for sale at Diamond Condominium. Other 3 bedroom condo units also available for sale near Patong Beach, Phuket. Please contact Thai Residential [email protected] for details.

titles.title: The Baycliff Residence Penthouse, Patong.

descriptions.description: 3 Bedroom Condo for sale in The Baycliff Patong, Patong, PhuketBay Cliff is a condo development located in Kalim, Phuket, Thailand. It is 1.4km from the beach with 54 condo units across 7 floors completed in January of 2010. It is hotel-managed and features an on-site restaurant, a swimming pool, a communal jacuzzi, a fitness center, 24-hour security, CCTV, a reception/lobby area, a shuttle to the beach, car parking, a steam room, a sauna. Sitting on a cliff that overlooks Patong Bay, The Bay Cliff Condominium offers suites in Phuket. Providing free Wi-Fi, it features a rooftop swimming pool with mountain and sea views. Property Description This stylish condominium development is about 1.5km parallel to Patong Beach and is just 100 meters from the beach in Kalim - considered to be one of the most panoramic beaches in Phuket. The unobstructed 180 Degree view from the balcony of the entire Kalim and Patong Bay’s are absolutely breathtaking. ; and 24-hour on-site security and automatic card control car parking with gate access. With a private elevator opening into the condo, Private Infinity Edged Pool, large living room and bedrooms this Penthouse suits permanent living or as a rental investment. Unique to the development are materials used such as wood parquet in the living and dining rooms and white powder-coated aluminum sliding windows; tropical landscaping with water features and reflection pools; Infinity Edged Pool and Jacuzzi pool and 24-hour on-site security and automatic card control car parking with gate access. Year Built: 2010Common Area fee: Yearly 65 THB/sqmArea of penthouse: 220 sqmFreehold OwnershipPrice: Reduced from 28 Million to 23 Million.3 x Bedrooms (all rooms have air-cons, dressing areas, block out curtains and wardrobes)3 x Bathrooms (2 x ensuite with both showers and baths)Freehold OwnershipLarge living and dining (two air-cons)Well equipped kitchen with air-con.Private Splash pool on the terrace with 180 Degree View.Terrace overlooking Patong and Kalim Bay.Storage Room inside the condo.Tv's in the living area and main bedroom.Car park per unit allocated.Private lift leading into the Condo.Complex large pool and Gym.24-hour security.

titles.title: 1 Bedroom Foreign Freehold Condo for Sale at Patong Tower, Phuket.

descriptions.description: 1 Bedroom Condo for sale in Patong Tower Sea View Condo, Patong, PhuketRESALE. Patong Tower is the tallest and most certainly one of the most iconic building in Phuket. It is also very close to Patong Beach, only 150 meters. In Patong Beach your choices are as endless as you can imagine. Whether you choose to enjoy a peaceful day amidst the tranquil nature with a favorite book, relax on the beach and soak up a tropical tan, jet ski, windsurf, or just take a dip in the sparkling blue sea, there will always be something for you to do. And…. your choices do not go down with the sun since Patong never sleeps! This 1 bedroom condo for sale in Patong Tower is on the 10th floor and has amazing views of the city and the surrounding mountains. It comes fully furnished and is FOREIGN FREEHOLD. Located in a prime location and right in the heart of the golden Patong beach. Banks, restaurants, entertainment and shopping areas are all within walking distance. Jungceylon is a very easy 300 meters away or a 5 minute walk whilst Bangla Road is in 350 meters. Phuket International Airport is only a 32 km drive. Additional 1 bedroom and 2 bedroom condo units also available for sale in Patong Tower. Other 1 bedroom condo units also available for sale in Patong, Phuket. Please contact Thai Residential for details.

titles.title: WOW!! Bayshore Ocean View Condominium View Nature and Entertainment.

descriptions.description: 1 Bedroom Condo for sale in Bayshore Ocean View Condominiums, Patong, Phuket1 bedroom condominium for sale 3,500,000 THB 40 sq.m. Bayshore Ocean View Condominiums, Patong, Phuket. Stunning complex nestled in the hills overlooking Patong Beach and the Andaman Sea. Its commanding position provides stunning sea views from most of its eight floors. There will be 138 apartments in two buildings. The huge pool complex and garden will be the centerpiece for relaxation and entertainment. A wide range of services and amenities will satisfy the needs of our guests. The eight-storey buildings offer beautiful views of the sea, mountains and pool. The large garden and pool area is served by a restaurant and pool bar. The house offers spacious underground parking for residents. The 24-hour shop sells snacks and other essentials. The condominium is located about 1 km from the beach and just a short drive from the main shopping and entertainment areas. Кондоминиум с 1 спальней на продажу 3,500,000 бат 40 кв.м. Кондоминиумы Bayshore Ocean View, Патонг, Пхукет. Потрясающий комплекс расположен на холмах с видом на пляж Патонг и Андаманское море. Его командное положение обеспечивает потрясающий вид на море с большей части его восьми этажей. В двух зданиях будет 138 квартир. Огромный комплекс бассейнов и сад станут центральным элементом для отдыха и развлечений. Широкий спектр услуг и удобств удовлетворит потребности наших гостей. Из восьмиэтажных зданий открывается прекрасный вид на море, горы и бассейн. Большой сад и бассейн обслуживаются рестораном и баром у бассейна. Дом предлагает вместительный подземный паркинг для жителей. В круглосуточном магазине можно приобрести закуски и другие предметы первой необходимости. Кондоминиум расположен примерно в 1 км от пляжа и всего в нескольких минутах езды от основных торговых и развлекательных районов.

titles.title: Garden View One Bedroom Investment Condos at Naka Bay, Kamala, Phuket.

descriptions.description:
1 Bedroom Condo for sale in Kamala, PhuketPromotional price on leasehold garden view units reduced to 2.99M THB from 4.1M THB.
Including a full furniture package + rental guarantee of 7% for 15 years (no electricity, no maintenance fee, no sinking fund) for the first 15 years.
Optional buyback option at full original purchase price +10% after 5 years.
The project is 80% completed.
These condos are located only a stone-throw-away from the pristine white sands and refreshing waters of Nakalay Beach, one of Phuket’s hidden gems. This brand-new project provides buyers the opportunity to live luxuriously without having to make sacrifices on views or location.
This project is developed by an experienced and well-known expert who has worked on several other prestigious condominium projects on the island.
The condominium features on-site amenities such as a full functioning clubhouse, access to a state-of-the-art gym, a refreshing shared swimming pool, a revitalizing wellness center, and spa, as well as a conveniently located restaurant that serves both Thai & Western cuisine.
The condominium boasts all of the conveniences of a home with the resort-feel of luxury and breathtaking views of all of Phuket’s finest mountains and beaches. There are 116 units available all with 35 square meters of open living space, 1 bedroom with expansive windows which allow for maximum natural light, 1 modern bathroom, an open-plan kitchenette, and jaw-dropping sea views throughout the entire condo.
Owner Benefits The development boasts ideal investment opportunities with a possibility of 7% NET rental guarantee for 15 years (no monthly fees, no electricity, no maintenance, no sinking fund).
Possibility for the Owner to use the unit 4 weeks in low season or 2 weeks in high season and 2 weeks in low season, free from the costs of electricity, water, and monthly fee. The Owner can also obtain the Unit usage rights during Peak Season upon pay compensation equal to 50% of the official rental fee.
Free daily shuttle service to the beach is included. Discounts on tours bookings and Residence Restaurant and Spa prices will be offered.
Buy Back Option: 10-15 years from the closing date buyer may apply for the buyback option and receive back all the money paid. After 15 years possibility of renegotiating a new rental guarantee period.

titles.title: Studio Condo near Beach at Premium Hotel Managed Property in Kamala.

descriptions.description:
Condo for sale in Kamala, PhuketThis is a highly recommended resort residence just 380 meters from the beachfront of Kamala. It is operated by a 5-star hotel M Gallery by Accor group.
Kamala is an up-and-coming area of Phuket with several condominium projects under development, which are expected to give the beach town a huge up-swing in terms of tourism, restaurants, and shopping options.
The freehold condominium is built upon an area of 22 rai (35,200 sqm) and will house 236 spacious luxury studios and one-bedroom residences across 39 low-rise blocks (2-5 stories). The unit sizes span from 47 – 70 sqm.
The community is gated and guarded with 24-hour patrol & monitored CCTV.
Invest now and make massive capital gains early as prices will go up.
Key Features Only 380 meters to the beachfront Located on a sought-after, serene location surrounded by forested hills Free stay of 45 days/year for owners Fully furnished with fine furniture Operated by MGallery Residences Facilities Tranquil Lakes, Leisure and Lap Pools, Kid’s Pool, Pool Bar, Clubhouse and Fitness Center, Kid’s Fun Club, All Day Dining Restaurant, Green Deck, Starlight Deck, Yoga Platform, Relaxation Pavilion, Nature Trail and Jogging Track.

titles.title: 1 Bedroom Foreign Freehold Resort Condo for Sale by Owner at Emerald Terrace near Patong Beach, Phuket.

descriptions.description: 1 Bedroom Condo for sale in Patong, PhuketRESALE. Well-placed in the shopping, nightlife, beach areas of Phuket, a most conducive spot to take a break from busy days. A convenient location, where the city’s must-see destinations are within easy reach. The location is very convenient. Winding roads up the hill give a semblance of isolation and yet is close enough to walk to the soft white sands of the beach and the vibrant nightlife district on Bangla Road. This 1 bedroom FOREIGN FREEHOLD Condo for Sale by the owner at Emerald Terrace near Patong Beach in Phuket is a ground floor unit with sliding glass doors opening up to the garden. It comes fully furnished, well maintained and offers facilities to enrich your stay. The resort’s hot tub, fitness center and outdoor pool are ideal places to relax and unwind after a busy day. There is 24-hour security, a convenience store, daily housekeeping and a laundromat. An ideal place of stay if you are seeking charm, comfort and convenience in Patong. Patong Beach is only a 4 minute drive or a 20 minute walk if you are fit & hardy! Patong City center is just 5 minutes away. For a change of scenery, Phuket Town is a 25 minute drive and so is the Laguna Resort Complex. Phuket International Airport can be reached within 40 minutes. Additional studio, 1 bedroom and penthouse condo units of varying sizes and prices also available for sale at Emerald Terrace Patong. Other 1 bedroom condo units also available for sale near Patong Beach, Phuket. Please contact Thai Residential [email protected] for details.
